text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea ovata (called, along with some other species in the genus Shorea, Dark Red Meranti) is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is a tree found in Sumatra, Peninsular Malaysia, Borneo and the Philippines. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea ovata". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33484A9781438. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33484A9781438.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
